articles.title: Nokia C5 Endi, C2 Tava and Tennen announced - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: The new budget handsets will soon be available in the US.
articles.content: HMD quietly updated its entry-level lineup for the US and Cricket Wireless. The Nokia C5 Endi, C2 Tava and Tennen bring Android 10, triple camera setups and affordable pricetags. The C2 Tava and Tenn… [+1567 chars]
